name: Takes Two to Disco
description:
Move around the bottom player in order to control the runner up top, hunt down the appropriate controls to get him through the level.
Controls

  • A/D to move
  • Spacebar to jump
  • J to shoot

Takes Two to Disco is a jam game for the GMTK2020 jam, where you run around the bottom  half of the screen trying to hunt down powerups for your out of control runner on his way home from a disco gone terrible wrong.

Team Members

  • CodyEthanJordan - code
  • D Brad - code
